creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: chalice, part of a communion set, engraved design of sun, cross three nails, and initials [IHS] and inscription
inscription:
Inscription; Mark

on bottom: [Presented by John Wheelton Esq to the Revd Thos Watson M.A. Minister of St Philip, Granville Square, London a Testimony of affectionate regard, and a family acknowledgement of their high appreiciation of his valuable Ministry]
markings: marked with asterisks of Matthew Boulton
title: Chalice from a communion set
